client
Interface Job

All Known Implementing Classes:
EuclideanTspJob, FibonacciJob, MandelbrotSetJob
public interface Job

Defines how the problem is broken up into tasks Task and later, combines the solutions for subdivided tasks into solution for the overall problem

Author:
Vijayaraghavan Subbaiah
